data.name: core/archives
data.title: Archives
data.description: Display a date archive of your posts.

data.name: core/audio
data.title: Audio
data.description: Embed a simple audio player.

data.name: core/avatar
data.title: Avatar
data.description: Add a user’s avatar.

data.name: core/pattern
data.title: Pattern Placeholder
data.description: Show a block pattern.

data.name: core/button
data.title: Button
data.description: Prompt visitors to take action with a button-style link.

data.name: core/buttons
data.title: Buttons
data.description: Prompt visitors to take action with a group of button-style links.

data.name: core/calendar
data.title: Calendar
data.description: A calendar of your site’s posts.

data.name: core/code
data.title: Code
data.description: Display code snippets that respect your spacing and tabs.

data.name: core/column
data.title: Column
data.description: A single column within a columns block.

data.name: core/columns
data.title: Columns
data.description: Display content in multiple columns, with blocks added to each column.

data.name: core/comment-author-name
data.title: Comment Author Name
data.description: Displays the name of the author of the comment.

data.name: core/comment-content
data.title: Comment Content
data.description: Displays the contents of a comment.

data.name: core/comment-date
data.title: Comment Date
data.description: Displays the date on which the comment was posted.

data.name: core/comment-edit-link
data.title: Comment Edit Link
data.description: Displays a link to edit the comment in the WordPress Dashboard. This link is only visible to users with the edit comment capability.

data.name: core/comment-reply-link
data.title: Comment Reply Link
data.description: Displays a link to reply to a comment.

data.name: core/comment-template
data.title: Comment Template
data.description: Contains the block elements used to display a comment, like the title, date, author, avatar and more.

data.name: core/comments
data.title: Comments
data.description: An advanced block that allows displaying post comments using different visual configurations.

data.name: core/comments-pagination
data.title: Comments Pagination
data.description: Displays a paginated navigation to next/previous set of comments, when applicable.

data.name: core/comments-title
data.title: Comments Title
data.description: Displays a title with the number of comments.

data.name: core/cover
data.title: Cover
data.description: Add an image or video with a text overlay.

data.name: core/details
data.title: Details
data.description: Hide and show additional content.

data.name: core/embed
data.title: Embed
data.description: Add a block that displays content pulled from other sites, like Twitter or YouTube.

data.name: core/file
data.title: File
data.description: Add a link to a downloadable file.

data.name: core/footnotes
data.title: Footnotes
data.description: Display footnotes added to the page.

data.name: core/form
data.title: Form
data.description: A form.

data.name: core/form-submission-notification
data.title: Form Submission Notification
data.description: Provide a notification message after the form has been submitted.

data.name: core/form-submit-button
data.title: Form Submit Button
data.description: A submission button for forms.

data.name: core/gallery
data.title: Gallery
data.description: Display multiple images in a rich gallery.

data.name: core/group
data.title: Group
data.description: Gather blocks in a layout container.

data.name: core/heading
data.title: Heading
data.description: Introduce new sections and organize content to help visitors (and search engines) understand the structure of your content.

data.name: core/home-link
data.title: Home Link
data.description: Create a link that always points to the homepage of the site. Usually not necessary if there is already a site title link present in the header.

data.name: core/image
data.title: Image
data.description: Insert an image to make a visual statement.

data.name: core/latest-comments
data.title: Latest Comments
data.description: Display a list of your most recent comments.

data.name: core/latest-posts
data.title: Latest Posts
data.description: Display a list of your most recent posts.

data.name: core/list
data.title: List
data.description: An organized collection of items displayed in a specific order.

data.name: core/list-item
data.title: List Item
data.description: An individual item within a list.

data.name: core/more
data.title: More
data.description: Content before this block will be shown in the excerpt on your archives page.

data.name: core/navigation
data.title: Navigation
data.description: A collection of blocks that allow visitors to get around your site.

data.name: core/page-list
data.title: Page List
data.description: Display a list of all pages.

data.name: core/page-list-item
data.title: Page List Item
data.description: Displays a page inside a list of all pages.

data.name: core/paragraph
data.title: Paragraph
data.description: Start with the basic building block of all narrative.

data.name: core/post-navigation-link
data.title: Post Navigation Link
data.description: Displays the next or previous post link that is adjacent to the current post.

data.name: core/post-template
data.title: Post Template
data.description: Contains the block elements used to render a post, like the title, date, featured image, content or excerpt, and more.

data.name: core/post-terms
data.title: Post Terms
data.description: Post terms.

data.name: core/preformatted
data.title: Preformatted
data.description: Add text that respects your spacing and tabs, and also allows styling.

data.name: core/pullquote
data.title: Pullquote
data.description: Give special visual emphasis to a quote from your text.

data.name: core/query-title
data.title: Query Title
data.description: Display the query title.

data.name: core/query-total
data.title: Query Total
data.description: Display the total number of results in a query.

data.name: core/quote
data.title: Quote
data.description: Give quoted text visual emphasis. "In quoting others, we cite ourselves." — Julio Cortázar

data.name: core/read-more
data.title: Read More
data.description: Displays the link of a post, page, or any other content-type.

data.name: core/rss
data.title: RSS
data.description: Display entries from any RSS or Atom feed.

data.name: core/search
data.title: Search
data.description: Help visitors find your content.

data.name: core/separator
data.title: Separator
data.description: Create a break between ideas or sections with a horizontal separator.

data.name: core/shortcode
data.title: Shortcode
data.description: Insert additional custom elements with a WordPress shortcode.

data.name: core/site-logo
data.title: Site Logo
data.description: Display an image to represent this site. Update this block and the changes apply everywhere.

data.name: core/site-tagline
data.title: Site Tagline
data.description: Describe in a few words what the site is about. The tagline can be used in search results or when sharing on social networks even if it’s not displayed in the theme design.

data.name: core/site-title
data.title: Site Title
data.description: Displays the name of this site. Update the block, and the changes apply everywhere it’s used. This will also appear in the browser title bar and in search results.

data.name: core/spacer
data.title: Spacer
data.description: Add white space between blocks and customize its height.

data.name: core/table
data.title: Table
data.description: Create structured content in rows and columns to display information.

data.name: core/table-of-contents
data.title: Table of Contents
data.description: Summarize your post with a list of headings. Add HTML anchors to Heading blocks to link them here.

data.name: core/tag-cloud
data.title: Tag Cloud
data.description: A cloud of popular keywords, each sized by how often it appears.

data.name: core/template-part
data.title: Template Part
data.description: Edit the different global regions of your site, like the header, footer, sidebar, or create your own.

data.name: core/term-description
data.title: Term Description
data.description: Display the description of categories, tags and custom taxonomies when viewing an archive.

data.name: core/verse
data.title: Verse
data.description: Insert poetry. Use special spacing formats. Or quote song lyrics.

data.name: core/video
data.title: Video
data.description: Embed a video from your media library or upload a new one.
